actions.text: Amendment (A004) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Woodall.
On agreeing to the Woodall amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 104 - 132, 171 Present (Roll no. 86).

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 4 printed in House Report 113-21 and offered as the Republican Study Committee proposal.
purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 4 printed in House Report 113-21 to balance in four years, remove the fiscal cliff tax increases, and cut discretionary spending to FY2008 levels.
